select i.*, AVG(r.score) AS media from AssetEntries_AssetCategories ec INNER JOIN AssetEntry a on ec.entryId= a.entryId INNER JOIN IM_Idea i on i.ideaId=a.classPK LEFT JOIN RatingsEntry r ON r.classPK=a.classPK WHERE (ec.categoryId= ?) GROUP BY r.classPK ORDER BY media DESC, i.createDate DESC
select idea.*, AVG(r.score) AS media from AssetEntry a, RatingsEntry r, IM_Idea idea WHERE a.classPK=r.classPK AND idea.ideaId=a.classPK GROUP BY r.classPK ORDER BY media DESC, idea.createDate DESC
